title: OOL team LF Coach
body:
Hey, im the manager of a top 5 OOL team and am currently looking for a coach to bring on to help the team improve. 

Here is what would possibly be required from you:
Pick and Ban
Strategic Coach
Gameplay analysis
Player growth and improvement
Relaying of information is vital

If you would like more information please feel free to add me on league for further discussions and we can go from there.

replies.body: Hey bud add hammar97 in game if you are still looking for a good coach
